abilities.name: Amy Vanguard
abilities.description:
Tuned footwork that maintains advantage after trades.

Amy looks to the greats for guidance, encouraging allies, reducing their skill cooldowns by 9% and intensifying Amy’s Aura.

Aura: Encouraged allies are now Energized.

Amy and Encouraged allies are healed for 12 HP every second.

These effects last until another skill is cast.

Energized allies gain +7 Energy from their Basic Attacks.

abilities.name: Amy Pulse
abilities.description:
Solid fundamentals that reduce risk in prolonged fights.

Amy looks to the greats for guidance, encouraging allies, reducing their skill cooldowns by 8% and intensifying Amy’s Aura.

Aura: Encouraged allies are now Energized.

Amy and Encouraged allies are healed for 10 HP every second.

These effects last until another skill is cast.

Energized allies gain +6 Energy from their Basic Attacks.

abilities.name: Cait's Resolve
abilities.description: A signature move that amplifies presence and control without referencing origins.
